name: The Treasure of Mount Aallvaridge
description:
You have traveled two weeks through rolling hills and thick forest, following the treasure map's vague descriptions. Finally, you have arrived. In front of you lies a treacherous mountain, a large door built into the side. Treasure awaits.

Delve into the treacherous dungeon of Mount Aallvaridge in this text-based game. You will have to keep your wits about you to survive as you avoid traps and solve puzzles to find the treasure hoard.

Perhaps, along the way, you may find a bit of yourself.
